items.customDescription: While using Normal Damage: +15% Magic Damage Bonus from Equipment and +25% Summoning Maximum Hit. Reduces the Light and Body Rune cost of spells by 2, and the Fire Rune cost of spells by 4 when equipped. Also grants access to Tier IV Auroras when equipped.
Reduces the Abyss Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1, +5% flat Abyssal Slayer Region effect negation and +10% chance to ignore Fear.
Reduces the Abyss Rune cost of Magic Spells by 2, +10% flat Abyssal Slayer Region effect negation, +15% chance to ignore Fear, and +3% chance to apply Fear when hitting with an attack.

Reduces the Abyss Rune and Eldritch Rune cost of Magic Spells by 2, +15% flat Abyssal Slayer Region effect negation, +25% chance to ignore Fear, +25% chance to ignore Eldritch Curse, and +5% chance to apply Fear when hitting with an attack.
Reduces the Abyss Rune cost of Magic Spells by 3.
Reduces the Umbral Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1 and gives the Enemy: +30% Damage taken from Toxin.
Reduces the Shade Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1 and +15% Magic critical hit chance and Gives the Enemy: -3% Abyssal Resistance.
Reduces the Shade cost of Magic Spells by 3.
Reduces the Dread Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1.
Reduces the Scourge Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1.
Reduces the Hollow and Desolate Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1.
Reduces the Void Rune cost of Magic Spells by 1.
